name: Booking System
description: End-to-end reservation system with calendar view, payment processing, and guest communication.
longDescription:
Our Booking System streamlines the entire reservation process from initial inquiry to final checkout. With an intuitive calendar interface and robust payment processing, you can manage bookings efficiently while providing a seamless experience for your guests.

Features include:
- Interactive availability calendar
- Automated confirmation emails
- Secure payment processing
- Custom booking rules and restrictions
- Group booking management
- Cancellation and modification handling
- Guest communication tools
